mapper.select:
select t1.id , t1.table_id , t1.col_name , t1.col_type , t1.col_length , t1.col_nullable , t1.col_default , t1.col_comments , t1.col_is_pk , t1.col_decimal , t1.col_is_unique , t1.sys_application_id , t1.org_identity , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.creation_date , t1.created_by , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.col_is_sys from db_table_col t1
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.TABLE_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.tableId}),'%')
and t1.COL_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colName}),'%')
and t1.COL_TYPE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colType}),'%')
and t1.COL_LENGTH like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colLength}),'%')
and t1.COL_NULLABLE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colNullable}),'%')
and t1.COL_DEFAULT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colDefault}),'%')
and t1.COL_COMMENTS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colComments}),'%')
and t1.COL_IS_PK like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colIsPk}),'%')
and t1.COL_IS_UNIQUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colIsUnique}),'%')
and t1.SYS_APPLICATION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.sysApplicationId}),'%')
and t1.ORG_IDENTITY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.orgIdentity}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.COL_IS_SYS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colIsSys}),'%')
order by ${P_OrderBy}
order by t1.col_is_sys desc,t1.creation_date desc
select t1.* from db_table_col t1 where t1.table_id=#{bean.tableId} and (t1.COL_IS_SYS ='N' or t1.COL_IS_SYS is null) and t1.COL_NAME not IN(select INDEX_COL from DB_TABLE_INDEX)

select t1.id , t1.table_id , t1.col_name , t1.col_type , t1.col_length , t1.col_nullable , t1.col_default , t1.col_comments , t1.col_is_pk , t1.col_is_unique , t1.sys_application_id , t1.org_identity , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.creation_date , t1.created_by , t1.col_decimal , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.col_is_sys from db_table_col t1
or t1.ID =#{bean.id}
or t1.TABLE_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.tableId}),'%')
or t1.COL_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colName}),'%')
or t1.COL_TYPE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colType}),'%')
or t1.COL_LENGTH like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colLength}),'%')
or t1.COL_NULLABLE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colNullable}),'%')
or t1.COL_DEFAULT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colDefault}),'%')
or t1.COL_COMMENTS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colComments}),'%')
or t1.COL_IS_PK like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colIsPk}),'%')
or t1.COL_IS_UNIQUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.colIsUnique}),'%')
or t1.SYS_APPLICATION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.sysApplicationId}),'%')
or t1.ORG_IDENTITY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.orgIdentity}),'%')
or t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
or t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
or t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
or t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
or t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
or t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
or t1.COL_IS_SYS =#{bean.colIsSys}
order by ${P_OrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.table_id , t1.col_name , t1.col_type , t1.col_length , t1.col_nullable , t1.col_default , t1.col_comments , t1.col_is_pk , t1.col_is_unique , t1.col_decimal , t1.sys_application_id , t1.org_identity , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.creation_date , t1.created_by , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.col_is_sys from db_table_col t1 where t1.id = #{id}

select t1.id , t1.table_id , t1.col_name , t1.col_type , t1.col_length , t1.col_nullable , t1.col_default , t1.col_comments , t1.col_is_pk , t1.col_is_unique , t1.col_decimal , t1.sys_application_id , t1.org_identity , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.creation_date , t1.created_by , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.col_is_sys from db_table_col t1 where t1.table_id = #{id}

id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
table_id =#{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
col_name =#{colName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id} and version =#{version}
